TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit URLConnection extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The abstract class URLConnection is the superclass of all classes that represent a communications link between the application and a URL.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns setting for connect timeout. -or- Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when opening a communications link to the resource referenced by this URLConnection.
Docs.value: an int that indicates the connect timeout value in milliseconds

Docs.summary: Retrieves the contents of this URL connection.
Docs.value: the object fetched. The instanceof operator should be used to determine the specific kind of object returned.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs obtaining the content.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the content-encoding header field.
Docs.value: the content encoding of the resource that the URL references, or null if not known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the content-length header field.
Docs.value: the content length of the resource that this connection's URL references, -1 if the content length is not known, or if the content length is greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the content-length header field as a long.
Docs.value: the content length of the resource that this connection's URL references, or -1 if the content length is not known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the content-type header field.
Docs.value: the content type of the resource that the URL references, or null if not known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the date header field.
Docs.value: the sending date of the resource that the URL references, or 0 if not known. The value returned is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970 GMT.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GuessContentTypeFromName(string fname) cil managed

Docs.summary: Tries to determine the content type of an object, based on the specified "file" component of a URL.
Docs.returns: a guess as to what the content type of the object is, based upon its file name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GuessContentTypeFromStream(class System.IO.Stream is) cil managed

Docs.param: an input stream that supports marks.
Docs.summary: Tries to determine the type of an input stream based on the characters at the beginning of the input stream.
Docs.returns: a guess at the content type, or null if none can be determined.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an I/O error occurs while reading from the input stream.
